overview: Tall, leggy Alanah & Tanya prove...that horizontal is the great equalizer!  Bobbi teaches Andy that true sluts...take it up their butts!  Strippers Faye & Dani...do the "pole" dance!  Workout queens Heather & Charlie go P90XXX!  Redheads Marie & Ashlyn prove...the carpets match the d!
title: Double vision 3
